approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency in accessing and managing V-KYC recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings, which are stored on the LTF 'NFS' server. This manual process is time-consuming and inefficient. This project aims to streamline the process by providing a self-service portal.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created to provide access to V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All recordings of V-KYC shall be made available on this portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings shall be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date, month wise.
Users should be able to upload an Excel or text file with up to 50 LAN IDs.
The system should trigger a call to backend API to process the request after file upload.
Results should be displayed in a tabular format with a "Download All" option.
The table should have pagination to display only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records at a time will be downloaded.
File upload should be csv/txt file.
Post clicking the LAN the recording download shall start.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: Date and month-wise filtering of recordings.
Bulk download functionality (up to 10 records at a time).
Display of recording details (User ID, Call Duration, Status, Time, Date, NFS VKYC Upload Time).
non_functional_requirements: The system should be accessible only to authorized users (Team Leads and Process Managers).
The system should be secure and protect sensitive data.
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and download V-KYC recordings.
The new system reduces the time required to access recordings compared to the current process.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF 'NFS' server.
Download limitations (10 records at a time).
assumptions: The NFS server is accessible and recordings are stored in a consistent format.
The backend API for processing requests is available and functional.
The necessary infrastructure is in place to host the portal.
risks: Technical issues with the NFS server or backend API.

recommendations: Add more details about the security requirements.
Specify the performance requirements (e.g., response time).

recommendations_for_completion: Define specific security measures (e.g., encryption, access controls).
Specify performance targets (e.g., page load time, search response time).
Document the data retention policy, including how long recordings are stored and how they are archived or deleted.
